alert.note: Alert for Sullivan (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 5:03PM EDT until August 12 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Sullivan County in central New York... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 502 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Stalker, or 18 miles west of Liberty, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Liberty, South Fallsburg, Fremont, Jeffersonville, White Sulphur Springs, Parksville, Loch Sheldrake, Stalker, Hazel and Livingston Manor. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central New York...and northeastern Pennsylvania. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
